languages.text: "Неумирающий благословил меня видеть истину в смерти. Как можно сомневаться в откровениях, дарованных Им?"

traits.locale_text: "Неумирающий благословил меня видеть истину в смерти. Как можно сомневаться в откровениях, дарованных Им?"

languages.text: "The Undying One has blessed me with the ability to see the truth in death. How can anyone doubt the revelations His blessing bestows?"
languages.original_text: "Неумирающий благословил меня видеть истину в смерти. Как можно сомневаться в откровениях, дарованных Им?"

traits.locale_text: "The Undying One has blessed me with the ability to see the truth in death. How can anyone doubt the revelations His blessing bestows?"
"I have never been wrong in my judgment before. I see no reason to doubt it this time."
"The Undying One has blessed me with the ability to see the truth in death. How can anyone doubt the revelations His blessing bestows?"
"I have never been wrong in my judgment before. I see no reason to doubt it now."
"The Undying One has blessed me with the ability to see the truth in death. How can anyone doubt the revelations His blessing bestows?"
"The Undying One has blessed me with the ability to see the truth in death. How can anyone doubt the revelations His blessing bestows?"

languages.text: "Der Todlose hat mich mit der Gabe gesegnet, im Tod die Wahrheit zu sehen. Wie könnte jemand an den Offenbarungen Seines Segens zweifeln?"
languages.original_text: "The Undying One has blessed me with the ability to see the truth in death. How can anyone doubt the revelations His blessing bestows?"

traits.locale_text: "Der Todlose hat mich mit der Gabe gesegnet, im Tod die Wahrheit zu sehen. Wie könnte jemand an den Offenbarungen Seines Segens zweifeln?"
"Ich lag bei meiner Einschätzung noch nie daneben. Ich sehe keinen Grund, jetzt daran zu zweifeln."

languages.text: «El Inmortal me ha bendecido con la habilidad de ver la verdad en la muerte. ¿Por qué iba a dudar alguien de las revelación que nos depara?».
languages.original_text: "The Undying One has blessed me with the ability to see the truth in death. How can anyone doubt the revelations His blessing bestows?"

traits.locale_text: «El Inmortal me ha bendecido con la habilidad de ver la verdad en la muerte. ¿Por qué iba a dudar alguien de las revelación que nos depara?».
«Jamás he errado en mi juicio. No veo motivo alguno para dudar de él ahora».

languages.text: 「不死の者が、死の中に真実を見る能力を授けてくださったのです。そのご加護を、誰に疑うことができるというのです？」
languages.original_text: "The Undying One has blessed me with the ability to see the truth in death. How can anyone doubt the revelations His blessing bestows?"

traits.locale_text: 「不死の者が、死の中に真実を見る能力を授けてくださったのです。そのご加護を、誰に疑うことができるというのです？」
「今まで判断を間違えたあことは一度もないわ。今も疑う理由はひとつもない」

languages.text: “不死之神赐予了我特别的能力，让我得以通过死亡看到真相。怎么会有人怀疑祂的祝福与启示呢？”
languages.original_text: "The Undying One has blessed me with the ability to see the truth in death. How can anyone doubt the revelations His blessing bestows?"

traits.locale_text: “不死之神赐予了我特别的能力，让我得以通过死亡看到真相。怎么会有人怀疑祂的祝福与启示呢？”
“我的判断从来没有出错过，现在也没有理由怀疑。”

languages.text: « L'Immortel m'a accordé la capacité de déceler la vérité dans la mort. Comment peut-on douter des révélations octroyées par Sa bénédiction ? »
languages.original_text: "The Undying One has blessed me with the ability to see the truth in death. How can anyone doubt the revelations His blessing bestows?"

traits.locale_text: « L'Immortel m'a accordé la capacité de déceler la vérité dans la mort. Comment peut-on douter des révélations octroyées par Sa bénédiction ? »
« Je n'ai pas fait d'erreur de jugement jusqu'ici. Je ne vois aucune raison de commencer maintenant. »
